import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-eventos', templateUrl: './eventos.component.html', styleUrls: ['./eventos.component.scss'] }) export class EventosComponent implements OnInit { public eventos: any = []; larguraImg: number = 150; margemImg: number = 2; exibirImagem: boolean = true; constructor(private http: HttpClient) { } ngOnInit() { this.getEventos(); } alterarImage(){ this.exibirImagem = !this.exibirImagem; } public getEventos(): void { this.http.get('http://localhost:5125/api/eventos').subscribe( response => this.eventos = response, error => console.log(error) ); } }
